Chimichanga!

My boyfriend and i have gone here a couple times and usually it is pretty great but today we went and it was absolutely disgusting food. I ordered the chicken bacon ranch and he ordered the italian sub. Both sandwich's were so bad we took two bites each and had to throw them away. waste of money. However the staff is friendly and sweet. the fries and ranch we had were fantastic.
Amazing! Love that everything is vegan.
Delicious! Best place in Omaha for vegetarian/vegan food!
Great place with great food! A must visit place especially for vegans.
The food was all spot on, the ice cream was impressive and our server, Moriah was awesome. The decor wasn't really my vibe and made me weary at first but definitely worth the visit!

GREAT FOOD, absolutely horrible service. They made the bartender our original waiter, and then he forgot about us. We had to call another waiter over to bring water and to take our appetizer order after 30 mins of being there. Our water wasn’t refilled until an hour later when we asked again. It took an hour and half to get our entrees out and another 45 mins for a single shake. We had 4 different waiters, only one visited twice after my mom finally said something. I was there for my birthday 🤦‍♀️

Hopefully this was an off day. I’ll try it again because the food was amazing but if I get this experience again I’ll never recommend it to anyone in the future.
Great. Can't wait to return

The friendliest staff I’ve ever encountered. Amazing experience. My comrade that I ate with even forgot his phone and they are willing to mail it to his house for him cuz we are on a oneway road trip back “home”. 50 stars out of 5. Thank you.
Amazing everytime!!!!  Even my carnivore husband loves it!!

You wouldn't expect a phenomenal vegan restaurant to exist in Nebraska, but here it is.

We ordered the Alfredo pasta and pepper jack steak sandwich. I'm not a real food critic, but both were substantial meals and absolutely delicious.

The steak sandwich came with potato salad, which I haven't had for years, and it was everything I remembered it was but without any guilt. It had a good amount of spice to it. Not overwhelming even for my wife who is averse to spicy food. The seitan was well seasoned, and much better than Ive had at other restaurants.

The Alfredo I've had before when they were only doing curbside pickup, and I must say it was a step above to eat it in person. The garlic bread it came with was phenomenal, and the greens on the side complimented it well enough.

Service was great and prompt. We had just come from a hike and our water glasses were always kept full.

Atmosphere was also pleasant, besides the guy we could overhear trying to debunk veganism to his date, lol. He seemed to love his food too though.

Overall a great place, we plan on making the trip back from Lincoln whenever we have an excuse to do so.
Great food and ice cream.  Enjoyed my meal

They took away the only thing I came here for:the bucket of wings. They make me wear a mask in my own vehicle like it’s their property. One thing to have things a certain way in your own property but don’t intrude on mine
So good! Had the nachos with the chimichanga and my wife got the Buffalo Mac and cheese. Can’t go wrong with anything you get here!

Modern Love was even better than I imagined it to be. I've been vegan for over 13 years, and this was by far my favorite meal I've had at a restaurant. The staff was so very friendly and the food came to us beautifully plated and in a short amount of time. I highly recommend the buffalo cauliflower mac and cheese.

I’m not vegan, but this place makes me want to be! So cool to see alternatives for literally everything…I love it! Modern cheeseburger is always my go-to, but this time I added the Buffalo Cauliflower Mac & Shews. Boy I’m glad I did! Everything was spectacular as always, and every time I leave, I’m already thinking of when to come back! The fried mozzarella appetizer is legitimately my favorite dish as well. I brought leftovers to my fiancé who is also not vegan, he loved it too.
It will be one of my favorites
Delicious food and kind, helpful staff. Not normally big vegan eaters, but found something all the adults and kids liked!

OMG the BEST vegan food ever!! The fried cheese just melts in the mouth, the steak and pepper jack was AMAZING. Food was so delicious, I bought the cookbook!
The restaurant was very easy to find, with convenient parking nearby. Restaurant was SUPER CUTE and comfortable. Menu is 100% vegan. Table and restrooms were clean. Wait staff was sweet and very knowledgeable. Sorry I didn't catch her name.
Overall I would return to Omaha just to eat at Modern Love again.

Came here for the first time during covid protocols to get takeout. Only ever got the buffalo wing bucket and it was amazing! Recently they opened there dine in area and it looks stunning! Not to mention that there chickpea parmesan hero, and there alfredo pesto were absolutely to die for! Amazing restaurant! The only issue we had was that the servers were having quite a time getting to our table in a timely manner, but that can be attributed to a completely booked evening. So great job!
Food was tasty! I am not vegan, but the food here is delicious, the cocktails are good, and the service is excellent.

This restaurant has it all. Perfectly crafted drinks (I only drank non-alcoholic ones), delicious food, decor and ambiance, and every meal was presented with such attention to detail. I tried a lot in my two days in Omaha: the chocolate milkshake, strawberry ice cream, blueberry cheesecake, butterfly lemonade, watermelon seltzer, classic mac n shew bowl, chik’n bacon ranch, and an Italian salad. Yes, I did. Everything was immaculate. I especially like the fried chik’n. They must have love in the batter? Bc I haven’t had a fried chik’n like that in my three years of veganism. I also really appreciate that it is made from tofu! Not the overly processed soy substitutes. Perfection. Modern Love receives an 11/10 from me.
The food or the drinks does not disappoint!  Everything was yummy. I am glad the dining room has reopened. The team members are very friendly and know how to work as a team!

Best vegan food I’ve had in a long time. Chickpea parm sandwich had so much flavor! Buffalo seitan wings were also delish, super spicy! For dessert I had the raspberry cheesecake, BOMB!! My to go order was missing the sandwich and thankfully i noticed before getting too far but still earns 5 stars because the food is beyond amazing!
Great staff and great food. Was an awesome stop for a vegan traveler

I've been vegan for five years and Modern Love has been my favorite vegan spot for three of those years. I absolutely love it. It's worth the three-four hour drive for me. The food is incredible and I hope to someday have everything on the menu.

This time around, I had the eggplant parmesan, mozzarella balls, and a strawberry shake. It was absolutely the best vegan meal I've had for as long as I can remember. I'm almost definitely going to drive up there again soon, if only for this amazing food.

Absolutely recommend it. No matter how far out of your way it might be, go to Modern Love!
My only complaint is my green blt wasn’t so green anymore but veryyyyyyy delicious probably ordering again for dinner 🥴🥰🥰🥰🥰
Still no dine in and masks are required to go in as of 6-26-2021. I probably should have called before showing up to check status.

This is my favorite vegan restaurant in the USA besides Vedge in Philadelphia. Everything made from scratch and delicious. We’re from Atlanta but make sure to visit every time we’re in town! BLT Mac on point! And you best try those cauliflower wings.
Very creative menu with many delicious options for everyone. The food is always well seasoned and delicious. Would highly recommend!!

Stopped by here on my way to a long road trip. Picked up about 2days worth of food. Had the fried tofu salad, cauliflower bites, the breaded tofu sandwich, garlic parmesan brussel sprouts and egg plant parmesan. All amazing. Ive been to many vegan places in Los Angeles and Las Vegas and everything here was delicious and fresh. Thank you for your wonderful service. Oh and the rose lemonade is so good! Will be back. Forgot to take pics of the food but it looked just like the pictures.

When calling my to go order in I let the girl on the phone know that I would be in at noon for my pick up order and I would pay cash. When I arrived, she let me know that she would have the cook start my order. Yes, I was a few minutes late, but NO ONE on the phone stated that I had to pay before my order would even be started!!! Super disappointing since I only have 30 minutes for lunch and was excited to finally try Modern Love.
Great service
Such a great restaurant. GREAT SERVIVE. Amazing Amazing food. I'm just a newly vegetarian but loved everything I ordered. Will be back ❤❤
Best vegan food I’ve ever had, bursts with flavour!
The food here is awesome.  The flavors are beyond vegan and the food is healthy.  I feel good about eating it from the salads to the entrees to the ice cream. Yummy!
Waited 20 minutes for order, was not ready at promised time
staff got unbelievably rude completely unprompted, I used to love this place

NACHOS NACHOS NAHCOS. Curious what walnut chorizo is? WONDER NO MORE. Y’all, these nachos are the BEST. Prior to coming here I thought I had found the best vegan nachos- I. WAS. WRONG. These nachos are hands down the best I’ve ever had- as both a vegan and non vegan. The cheese, the pickled toppings, the guac, the walrizo (work in progress)! If you ever find yourself in Omaha go here. And if you don’t have any upcoming trips to Omaha- make one. Worth the travels.
Also the fried mozz balls are drool worthy. Ok I’m done.
Go here.
Aliyah Very rude over the phone when I called to see if my order was ready for pick up.

I typically go here once a week and love it but my most recent experience here was horrible. Alleha (the front store manager) was extremely rude and had terrible costumer service skills. On top of that the order was made wrong. The employees never say the same thing about allergen specific questions which is not expectable when ordering a meal.
Great vegan food!

I just ordered the Almond Joy Brownie and Raspberry Cheesecake. My friend and I loved both of these desserts. The help was very friendly on the phone and they delivered the food to us outside. It has been recommended to me twice by folks that live in West Omaha, they drive all the way here. I’m definitely going back to try some of the entrees
Wonderful
Tried 3 dishes. You couldn't even tell that they didn't have animal products. It would have been nice to dine-in.
Got doordash from here multiple times and it’s safe to say that the kale Caesar salad is the singular best salad in Omaha. The Alfredo and seitan hot wings are amazing too.
Best seasoned, and prepared, seitan I’ve had in 16 years of being vegetarian

So thankful to have incredibly delicious vegan food in Omaha! The lunch special is such a good bang for your buck. We have tried almost all the menu items at this point and everything is amazing. We’ve brought so many “skeptic meat eaters here” and they’ve been wowed as well!

Today was my moment of truth.. I have been teetering on going vegan for quite some time for both ethical and health reasons. Today was my first order at ML and I will SOOOOO be back. I didn't know vegan food could possibly taste THIS good. I love veggies so I was hopeful, but there's so much flavor! I'm even more excited to be on this journey now.. You guys should hold cooking classes (hint hint ;)) Thank you again!

Overpriced as all hell, fries were burnt, and the individual that answered the phone was super unprofessional, to the point where we thought we called the wrong number. And to top it all off, they completely didn't include my drink on a takeout order. The entrees are hit or miss, but the hits are always amazing.
Great vegan food and convenient curbside pick-up. The nachos were tasty.
Very slow
Delicious food and awesome service!
Best Vegan food in OMAHA , thank you Modern Love .

This vegan food is meant to taste like the real thing and it is great. If a vegan place can make it in NYC you know it's good. The nachos are some of the best I've had- the amount of flavor packed in. Any pasta dish is always great. I was surprised at how much I liked the mozzarella balls. The one thing I wouldn't recommend- burgers. With all of the vegan ones in the market now there are plenty of better things on the menu (like the chicken parm fabulous)
Mozzarella sticks were yummy and filling. The cheeseburger and philly lacked spice and flavor. When returned home fries were already soggy after a 20 minute drive home. I may give another shot.
Best food in Omaha
They were super friendly & helpful with my diet & the food was amazing!

This is my favorite place in Omaha. You could take the Pepsi challenge of comparing any of their entrees with a non vegan restaurant around here and this place would still come out on top.

The menu is naughty. Nachos. Mac. Wings. Burgers. But then they also show their sophisticated side (It's always changing).

Your date could order a green goddess bowl, trying to not pig out because it's your first time out, but then you get curious and say "poutine burger? This has to be tried. I need to live my best life now".

She looks at your magnificent burger with envy. You politely ask "would you like a taste?" (To get her to stop staring). She takes the most massive bite you've ever seen, easily taking out half of your plate's real estate. Distraught, confused, yet intrigued, you only agree to another date because she concedes the last seitan wing to you (the wings are phenomenal, and you can order them in buckets.)

Years later you are married to this person. You named your kids after the members of the Wu Tang clan. Little Method man always asks to come back to modern love because he wants some of that mac and cheese. You've won the game of life because you decided to check out this vegan restaurant.

Their Desserts are pretty good too. Big fan of the cheesecake
Twice have made weekend trips to Omaha just to eat at Modern Love. Food, cocktails and desserts are amazing.
No eat in options. Had to call ahead. The pandemic is on the way out, time to open up.

They've done an amazing job keeping everyone safe over the last year. Their curbside takeout has been well run and the food continues to be outstanding. I look forward to returning for in-person dining, but not until restaurant employees are all able to get vaccinated (they weren't in a priority group in Nebraska like other states) along with the general public.
Initially went for the homemade vegan poptarts; since then I've been hooked on all there food. If you're looking for vegan food on the fly, give it a shot.
Good food but come on...open up your dining room already. Seriously.

I need to come back to Omaha just so I can eat my way through more of their menu.

The oatmeal cream pie is definitely worth it for dessert.
Love love love MOLO! Delicious food and large portions! Stopped on our way home from visiting daughter in Iowa— can’t wait to come again!!!

I ordered after I called ahead and they said they would be open until 8 pm. They charged me and then a hour later they said they were going to close early. So they would have to refund me my money. Still waiting for my refund.

Waited for 40 minutes for my door dash order pickup. I called the number about 8 times and got no response. I also waited outside for a bit trying to get somebodies attention. I understand there were power outages today, but there was no communication from the restaurant, which negatively affects my job status on the door dash side. I also wonder if other folks’ orders were ignored today. Disappointed :/

Visiting from Chicago
I’ve had a lot of vegan food and this place was outstanding from the Pattie Melt to the dessert!!!
A must try!!!

Daaammmmm! This was amazing!!! Got a smorgasbord. Buffalo Seitan Mac. You know the Mac is good if there’s a whole section for Mac and cheese. Nachos molo. I prefer fresh jalapeños but still amazing I’m sure they would do it if I asked for it. Kale Ceaser salad. Perfect fresh and crunchy. Went through the curbside pick up and whoever helped us was so nice! 10/10 stopped by on a road trip and wish this was in denver, Co. Think about it, y’all! Would add photos but it’s literally gone.

Good COVID practices- easy to use online ordering, curbside pickup, food packaged well- just had to zap mine a couple minutes.

I got the Mac and shews, with the cornbread tofu and grilled mushroom, and a brownie. I don't remember what me wife got.

I'm not vegan, and only a beginner sorta semi-vegetarian who loves steak, but this was delicious! The cashew cheese was very satisfying, and the grilled mushroom and tofu added a nice meat-like element. Everything was well made and just delicious.

My wife loved her meal as well, and three brownies, though maybe a little more fidgeting than is my preference, were great, too.

Only ding? It's a little expensive. But it was dang good mac and almost cheese!

Big fan of MoLo. I wish you had the meatloaf more often, because it’s truly off the charts amazing. The Mac & Shews never disappoints, and the burgers are meals in themselves. And the desserts? One of everything, please. So happy you’re in Omaha! ❤️
Came here last year around March while coming through Omaha. Had extremely poor service. Came back tonight to give it another try- staff seems to be just as rude. Food is not bad.
Modern love knocked it out of the park with their New Years Eve dinner for two

They have always been great but their response to Covid is outstanding. The commitment they have made to take out shows and I love getting food from there. Every special occasion during Covid has had Modern Love as the food choice.

Hands down one of the best vegan spots I have ever been too! I was driving thru Omaha on a road trip and stopped here for dinner and was absolutely BLOWN WAY! Their buffalo cauliflower wings are easily the best I have ever had! I was seriously contemplating turning around and driving back just to order more because it was one of the best flavors to ever grace my taste buds. I got their Channa masala for my entree, and it was also super tasty! Their portions are huge which if you have a hollow leg like I do then this is the right spot for you. Needless to say I am sad they don’t have one of these where I live and will no doubt be stopping here every trip through Nebraska I take!
Good food
Ate here a handful of times. Food was enjoyable, staff was horrid. Will not return.
We always try to get something new and it’s always unbelievable how good it is

Incredible food. We are always nervous to try something new on the menu because we don’t think it could be as good as what we got last time... yet it is always incredible! We’re committed to trying everything on the menu. This is our go to place for visiting family and friends 6/5 stars
Always great vegan food 😋

As someone who does enjoy meat, I'll eat the hell out of the seitan wings here and feel satiated and not miss the meat.
In addition to a great menu for all palates, they also carry great wine, and do contactless/curbside pickup.
🤙❤

I called to place an order over the phone as I normally do. The person who answered the phone was huffing and puffing and hat a tone in her voice as if it was an inconvenience for her to pick up the phone. When I told her I would like to place an order she told me to go online to order as a convenience. I let her know that I always call over the phone and no one has ever had an issue because I order one item. When I told her what I wanted to order which was simple it was macaroni she responded telling me to be more specific because there’s different versions. There’s really not. I let her know that I wanted to speak to someone else and she said that she’s the only one working today and I let her know that her voice and her attitude is really reflecting that. One of the reasons I like modern love is because of the experience. So don’t have someone working for you that finds it as an inconvenience to do something as simple as picking up the phone and greeting somebody with respect.

The best vegan Mac n cheez I’ve ever tried and I’ve had a lot. Topped it with mushroom bacon. SO GOOD! Kinda pricey but huge portions and really great food. Also tried their Green Goddess Bowl and Apple Cinnamon Pop Tart. Yum!! I recommend ordering thru their website instead of third party apps for cheaper prices :)
Funky after taste on the burger,
The most amazing vegan food you'll ever have.

Simply amazing!! Everything we ordered  from appetizers to dessert was full of flavor and clearly made with love ❤️!!! If we lived in Omaha we would be there allll the time!!! The kale ceaser salad and the buffalo Mac and cheese were some of our favorites!!!  Don’t forget to grab a raspberry oat bar on your way out!! :)

We adore Modern Love.  They have done the best job of any restaurant we frequent in ensuring safety during the pandemic. The service is always super and down to earth.  We had the cookie dough brownie and the peanut butter candy bar cheesecake tonight and they were fabulous.  Keep up the great work!
They have so many options that are vegan and gf friendly! Their Mac n cheese and cauliflower buffalo bites are fantastic!
My husband loved his bean burgers and steamed collard greens.  I could not have any as I am on no sodium diet.

We’ve been fortunate to eat in vegan restaurants all over the world. My husband is certain that Modern Love is the best, based solely on the “calamari” (mushrooms). They were that good. Also good: Mac-N-Shews and the Modern burger. Portions are generous so we are too full to eat the desserts we bought but they will be great for breakfast. We are making sure to reroute our road trip to come home via Omaha in order to eat at Modern Love again.

Phenomenal food! Due to the pandemic, we placed an order online, called on arrival and the staff set the food outside on a crate for us for safe, contactless handoff. They were super friendly and the food was absolutely delicious. We heard this was a must-visit vegan restaurant and since it was my first time in Nebraska, we made a point to come for dinner. The pumpkin cheesecake was amazing, as was the mac, tuna melt, and philly cheezsteak. The moz balls and the matcha mint milkshake were the stars of the show for sure though! Even non-vegan members of our group were impressed. It was hard to share. Will absolutely be back.
so tasty! very thought out dishes. 👏🏼
I eat here at least once a week and I think my body is starting to reject other foods
This was AMAZING. I got the chicken (chick pea) parm and it was so so so good. Everyone was so nice, prices were great, and generous portions.
Yesssss!!! The best vegan in NEBRASKA!
My partner and I are from NYC, so we've eaten at many dozens of top vegan restaurants over the years. Nonetheless, we both agreed that the fried mozzarella is the BEST thing we have ever tasted.

I was just passing though Omaha, and after not eating well for the past few days (eating vegan on the road is tough!) I was pleasantly surprised by this restaraunt. Always great to get some vegan comfort food. If Modern Love ever opened a Minnesota location, I'd probably eat it every week. Or, maybe I should move to Omaha and eat here every day.

On my first visit, i had some kind of soup that was so sensuous, rich and decadent, my taste  buds could not stop doing the happy dance!  The main course was midwest traditional comfort food a la vegan..OMG!!!! If I could have fit more flavors in I would have.  You will love this food even if you aren't vegan.. The service is great, the atmosphere is warm and friendly...Eat here.
Can't believe its vegan!!!

I have been to many vegan restaurants in many different cities, but none can measure up to Modern Love in Omaha. Their food is delicious, and in non-pandemic times, the atmosphere of the restaurant is chill and comforting. Since they started offering takeout, their packaging and menu items have adjusted well to the challenges of food to go. Additionally, all of their staff are friendly but well-practiced in social distancing and other precautions. They've got a good system.

They have something for everyone, from the foodie to the vegan to the carnivore, and everything in between. And even as a semi-regular customer (maybe twice a month), each time I order, I find something new and exciting, since their menu is simple yet rotates through new items each month. I haven't tried something I didn't find delicious.

Easily my favorite and go-to restaurant in Omaha, and quite possibly my favorite restaurant of all time. Would highly recommend.
Incredible food. Everything we ordered was amazing. Love the atmosphere and the staff are super friendly and nice. Great restaurant! Highly recommend!
This place is amazing and under rated. Eating here has made me eat soo much less meat. Their wings are better than chicken wings!

I am not going to lie I was super excited to eat here just to order today for the first time and my fries were soggy (like warmed up in a microwave warm 🙄) my hero sandwich was burnt and the cheese just slid right off which caused it to be messy and those wings....I had better overall rating 3/10 not impressed
The food is always good but the service is always slow.
So freaking GOOD!!! And I'm not even vegan lol. Also, the curbside pickup menu has been clutch in terms of price.
Yummy food. Specially cauliflower hot wings!
Today was my first time trying this restaurant and I must say.....I am truly impressed. The classic cheese burger with mushroom bacon was outstanding!

Honestly I love this restaurant. So delicious, Nice 👍 people. But today was disappointing, I’m a single mom and so it’s super special when I get to treat my two boys with yummy food, our tradition is cheese Thursday, so we get vegan Mac and shews and nachos and that feeds all of us! Usually so good for the price you pay! But tonight, look I get it’s Covid but I paid 37$ for Mac and shews and nachos and the Mac and shews fed one of us tonight. They gave me half of the the side order usually is and I paid 14$ for the entree. I cried cuz I worked so hard to just get my kids discouraged. But that was it...  So I don’t I usually don’t write reviews and if I did I do it privately but... this isn’t cool no matter who you are. You should get what you pay for.
The food is awesome! The Mac n cheese is my fav!🥰

Curbside. Order was supposed to be ready at 6:13.  They instruct you to call a specific number versus get out of your car. Called 27 times and got a busy recording. Finally got out of my car, parked illegally as all stalls were taken by other waiting curbside customers. Went to the door to try and get someone’s attention since their phones were obviously not working.  She rudely told me to step away from the door when it was so windy, I was trying to help get the door open a crack. But I get it. Told me she had no idea how long it would take and to go back to my car.  At 6:20, I called 5x and actually got through on the 5th try. She said they were running 30 minutes behind. It’s 7:10 and we’re still waiting. Called again for an estimated wait time. Guy was so rude. Told me I could leave and said there were still several orders ahead of us. This is my Mother’s Day.  Guess none of these young people care.

It’s now 7:27 and we are still waiting. After the rude man who said 30 minutes ago there were only 2 orders ahead of us, I called back and a ruder woman said there’s still 2 orders ahead now 35 more minutes later. We actually got her almost 1.5 hrs

I’ve been spending so much money here and there have been a few goofs but tonight is really upsetting. I ordered my food at 2:30 pm for a 5:30 pickup, didn’t get my food until 6:00 pm. I had a 5 min drive to my grandmother’s house and when I got here everything was cold. That’s the Mother’s Day dinner I got to serve my 94 yr old grandma and my mother.

I have been going to this restaurant since before it was relocated to the downtown area.  The restaurant is owned by a chef that ensures that every meal tastes just as good as it looks. Every time I dine there, I am blown away by the presentation and quality of the ingredients. My personal favorite is their nachos with soyrizo, paired up with any of their smoothies.

Only reason why they fell short of five stars is because during my first experience, I waited close to half an hour to be served my meal, even though the two tables to our right arrived much later and were served first. I never experienced that again, thankfully.

What can I say, food is outstanding. Everything popped with flavor and it’s been a long time since I left a restaurant with my wife and we talked about how good the meal was the whole ride home. Honestly I only recently cut all meat and dairy out of my diet, but I can truly say that the Modern Burger is better than most beef burgers I’ve ever had. AMAZING!!

If I had to give it a grade out of 10, it would be 8.9. Only reason it wouldn’t be higher was because the fries were cold.

update - third time ordering take out during the pandemic and all three times waited 30 mins (up to 45 mins this last time) past when they said it would be ready for them to bring it out. I’m sorry but that’s unacceptable. Dropping from 5 stars to 2 stars just for misleading customers.

I've been there twice and it's amazing! I had nachos, lasagna, a burger, and it was so good! We also had some vegan chicken nuggets. The box to take it home are biodegradable, which is very responsible!

Beware of their covid 19 curbside drop  off process. It is horrible and very inefficient. Additionally the manger James should be ashamed of Himself .

They gave my food away to the wrong person. Then tried to blame me because they couldn’t figure out that they gave away my food.

when I called in to let them know that they made an error and gave the wrong person my food. James the manager accused my wife and I of stealing the food by sending someone there to “intercept our food” .

Can you imagine, you place an order to
Support a business, they screw up the order, they have your money, and then instead of trying to fix it they accuse you of theft.

What an embarrassing display of customer service and an utter lack of professionalism. I will never eat here again.

rude customer service . Accuses loyal customers of theft , when they make mistakes .  Would not recommend .

I’ve only ever been here for take out as I only found out about it recently and dine in is closed for obvious reasons. I’m vegetarian and lactose intolerant and my assistant manager recommended this place because she’s vegan. As carry out goes Modern Love gets an A from me. The food has been top notch every time I’ve ordered and the shakes are very good! I just recently got one of the pop tarts and it was like a mini pie, definitely a must have! I would recommend this restaurant to anyone and everyone, meat eater or not.

This review is based on my curb side order today. We ordered 2 crunch wraps. They were both cold and neither one had any crunch. I’m guessing they were made the day prior and were removed from the fridge and not heated. It was a big let down. I expect more from Modern Love (especially since we paid almost $40 with a tip). We have been loyal customers and were trying to support a local business during a difficult time...and you give us cold leftovers.  This is an insult and a slap in the face.  The food in the past has always been good.  My only complaint is that occasionally the temperature of the food is not satisfactory....especially considering it supposedly just came out of the kitchen.  We will not be returning for curbside pick up and I will have to give a lot of thought to returning at all.

Ordered curb side pickup.  Easy and food excellent as usual. Had the burger, curry and nachos.
Packed to survive the trip home.  Tasty and a treat.
I’d come back to Omaha just for Modern Love!
The best vegan food there is to be had in Omaha 😛
Amazing vegan food and local beer.  The mac & cheese is to die for.
The seitan buffalo wings were amazing!! Service is to notch! Love this place💗💓
I've never had anything I didn't love from Modern Love. Their flavor combos are on point. Atmosphere is wonderful. Servers are always kind and attentive.
Super impressed with this Omaha Gem! While I was in town I ate here twice and both experiences were great! Vegan Food at its finest!
This place is delicious even for a carnivore like me. The food is amazing and they don't pretend that the food is meat they tell you exactly when each thing is made out of which I also appreciate. 😊
Could not imagine that vegan tastes so good
Had a tasty pepperjack burger and mango kombucha. The new space was lovely, and staff was friendly and helpful. Will definitely be back soon!
Great food and drinks. Tried the Kambucha Whiskey Sour, Crab Cakes and Pepper Jack Burger... Nothing disappointed.
Best food in Omaha!

I have always loved Molo, but ever since the new place opened I feel like it has gone a bit downhill which is super disappointing. It took nearly an hour to get our main entrees, which is the longest it has ever taken there. Drinks were slow to come to the table, too. We then ordered dessert and 2 cups of black coffee, which then took another 20 minutes to arrive. The dessert was carrot cake which literally just needed to be plated and brought out. I try to be understanding that they’re busier now, but if you can’t deliver quality service then you need to look at expanding your staff or kitchen to provide that. This isn’t a cheap restaurant to eat at and not everyone wants to have a dinner take 1 hour and 45 mins.
Yum!
Great food

The sign outside of the restaurant was out, which made it quite hard for my friend and I to find it. Inside, the tables are very close to each other, making it hard to have a conversation with the person you are with. The food tasted really good but the service was slow. I would go back again to try the breakfast/brunch menu.
Best vegan/plant base wings in town! Can't wait to go back.
Food was good staff was ok
Amazing and friendly staff food tastes great

We got a reservation, not sure if you have to have them or if it's just really difficult to get a spot without one.

Got the fried mozzarella and nachos to start out with. Nachos were spicy and great. The mozzarella had a lot of flavor but I wasn't really feeling the texture of the cheese, it was a lot like warm cream cheese on the tongue.

We also tried the burgers, which again had a lot of flavor but the texture of the patties were... idk... sausage like? Real dense and chewy like that. I wasn't a fan but my friends thought they we're phenomenal so it could have just been me.

The homemade ginger ale was bomb! I'm giving them 4 stars because vegan food can be hard and everything had great flavor. Textures creeped me out though.

My husband and I have been frequenting Modern Love for a few years. I have to say, our most recent visit just wasn’t up to par. Honestly, since they moved to their new location I haven’t been as happy with my food or service.
I’m sorry, because I adore this restaurant! Our service was mediocre last night, my food was cold, and I was actually kind of cold. My dessert was a delight, I had the cinnamon roll with ice cream and cherry compote. While it was delicious, it was served on a tiny plate making it a very messy dessert and difficult to eat.
I had the tempeh burger (no cheese) and fried for my side. My fries were cold, flavorless, and hard. My burger was also cold, and the bun was dry and flaking apart. I’ve ordered this meal dozens of times and it’s never been served this way. I miss the potato wedges that used to be served hot and full of flavor!

Went here for dinner with my wife tonight. I had only been to their previous tiny location so it was great to see the bigger space packed full! Even though it was busier than average for a Sunday, the staff was fantastic! The food was perfect, the menu was reasonably priced, and every staff member was friendly. They even send you off with a little gift :) If you haven't been, what are you waiting for?

My boyfriend and his friend went here today, they went here because of the menu, his friends don’t eat meat. Some of his friends ordered  drinks. Some didn’t. They closed their tab, but then changed their minds and wanted to order drinks. The waitress then told them, “no, you can’t order drinks once you’re tab is closed”. So they were confused at first, she then proceeded to tell them that they were being rude and loud. They were in shock, but they left quietly. I’ve been wanting to try this place. But from what I read on the reviews and How Shocked I am. That my friends were treated this way. I’m good, the name of the restaurant is (modern love) that’s not love at all.
Great food, wonderful staff, modern vibes! Best vegan food in town!
Best Vegan food I've ever experienced!!! Definitely going to be coming back here again!!!!

The food is DELICIOUS. Make sure to make reservations ahead of time though! They get very busy especially on weekends. As a vegan myself, this place was amazing it catered specifically for my dietary needs and it was reasonably priced!

EVERYTHING on the menu is vegan. My daughter loves it. I am sure the cost of ingredients drives up the prices a tad. Example: Appetizer of 3 "mozzarella balls" cost $10, you have to order at least 3 for a table a six. Overall experience was enjoyable. Nice and clean with friendly staff.
A must stop when I'm back in my hometown

Incredible experience! Great tasting tea and coffee (from a local coffee shop). All of their food is amazing and it is all vegan. My friends who are not vegan or vegetarian still absolutely love the food and love going here. I ordered their Chana Masala With Brussels Sprouts and added the tumeric grilled tofu. It was definitely enough for 2 servings, but it was so good that I could not stop eating to save leftovers. The best chana masala I have had. Pretty swanky vibe but not crazy expensive and can also be dressed very casually.
Service was slow. Food was decent at best. Definitely overpay for the "vegan" experience at this restaurant

Alexandra is hands down the most professional, kind, and fantastic person we've ever met, turned a typical night out into an absolute pleasure from making the whole order easy and precise, while keeping up on drinks without inhibiting the conversation of our table, it was truly magical to have such a smooth and seamless organic experience with such phenomenal customer service, and the picture attached is an empty plate because I ate absolutely everything put in front of me the quality and texture of the food is supreme and uncontested to anywhere in Omaha
Their nachos are my favorite

Best. Vegan. Ever.

Overall; enjoyed every delicious dish I've ever tried so far, friendly staff, previous location was a little intimate but manageable and I haven't been to the new digs yet.

Isa Chandra Moskowitz is a food icon and has thankfully helped put Omaha, nay Nebraska, on the vegan map.
Amazing in every way! Super friendly and helpful staff, amazing food, great atmosphere. Thank you!!

Excellent! The restaurant was quite busy & we did not have a reservation, but the friendly & acomadating staff were able to get our group seated in very short order. That, combined with the fact that I absolutely loved the eggplant lasagna I had made my experience here really great.
The bartender Lauren was great! The restaurant has a nice atmosphere and the food is pretty good.

Amazing food! Some of the best vegan food in the country. Also, their service is top notch. The owner is consistently present asking how things are going. Never had a bad experience here with food or service.
First time was great! Second time, meh! Atmosphere is nice. I felt rushed at my table, they wanted us out within an hour as they had someone else reserved for the table.
The wings are really good, good date spot.

The food was amazing, wine list was really nice, and the service was great.  I should have eaten here every day that I was in town.  While the prices may seem high at first, the portions are large and well worth it.  I was very pleasantly surprised.
Such a good vegan restaurant. The menu options are simple and approachable and they offer a really good portion. It’s a great price point with a moody/cozy/chic atmosphere. Highly recommend!
Pros and cons. The food is freaking amazing. The environment is cramped and the tables are tiny. And...the service is lackluster

I was a bit hesitant to try all vegetarian cuisine, but I was happily surprised by the selection and the quality. Though it seemed a little more uppity than I had expected, the service was great, and it's a very down to earth eatery. I'll most definitely be returning!
Fabulous food! Great atmosphere!

We ate here for our anniversary. It was our first experience eating here but it will not be our last. The food has so many flavors and textures. We had the soup  special and an appetizer. One entree and a bacon ranch burger. All of our food was plant based. We will be back again.
Always amazing!
Was very good
Amazing flavor on all my food,  quick service and cute spot. I will be returning!
It's vegetarian...............

We LOVE Modern Love!!! The food outstanding! The amviance outstanding. The service excellent. What is there left not to love? Not open 24 hrs a day and in every town!! She needs to franchise this. Only suggestion for the menu more no soy no wheat options please!!
Very good restaurant!
One of the best meals of my life. A must-visit destination.
Solid burgers and beers
Best vegan restaurant in town

Cozy atmosphere. Reservations recommended on weekends. Food is delicious except neither of us cared for the burger. There was just too much thickness and weirdness, difficult to get through more than a bite.

Service wasn’t a 5- server spent too much time chatting with coworkers than being attentive to refilling water, correcting our order, etc. An off day, will give another try.

Overall I’d recommend for those that want a truly vegan experience. We were looking forward to the ‘famous’ snicker dessert only to find it wasn’t on the menu. Milkshake was phenomenal and the strawberry sundae (with nuts) was superb!
It’s VEGAN and ITS DELICIOUS and has a great atmosphere! You can not go wrong! Lovely staff and there’s one in Brooklyn, NY too.
Had apps. Sooo delicious. Great cocktails with killer good desserts. Great way to end the weekend.
Tanto la calidad de la comida como la atención del los camareros es excelente. Enhorabuena!!!

The cauliflower sriracha wings are a must for anyone that likes things a little spicy. The crunchy texture and flavor is amazing. The milkshakes are very impressive for being vegan. Anyone that is lactose intolerant should definitely give these a try. Overall a great experience, creative and delicious cocktails, and tasty food. Would highly recommend.

Amazing food!! Excellent service!! Reservation recommended. But if you can swing it, Sunday hours are much longer and the brunch and lunch menus are great. Enjoy the nice, new, modern space and get your parking ramp ticket validated, too.
Delicious food, nice atmosphere, friendly staff. Reasonably priced and plenty of gluten-free options, too.

Omaha is very lucky to have a vegan restaurant of this level. The burgers and all the entrees I've tried have been great and the desserts do not disappoint either. Don't get hung up on the labels, this will change your conceptions of what vegan food can be.

If you are a non-meat eater, this place is a must. All the food was extremely appealing, offered great variety and tasted amazing. The restaurant is very classy and offers amazing ambiance and service. I've never been to a place like this in my 18 years in the US.
Interesting concept
Even if you aren’t full on vegan you’ll still love this place. My go to when visiting Omaha :)

I wanted to try something different and this place had great reviews. It was also suggested by our friends who had recently gone vegan. I had the cashew-based mac and cheese, and it was awful! My husband had some fake meat dish. We couldn't get over the weird tastes at textures, so everything was unappealing.
Food and dessert was amazing. Hostess and waitress (we sat at the bar) were lovely. I highly recommend this place. And-- get the ice cream sundae.
Heaven. Vegan heaven.
Totally awesome!!!  Excersize caution if your allergic to gluten, however, since some vegan meat alternatives do contain wheat gluten...
My fav vegan restaurant in Omaha!
Favourite spot for date night. Neither my husband or I are vegan and we have LOVED everything we have had there. The chickpea parm and poutine are my personal favs!
Tasty vegan food.

I'm vegan and adore this restaurant. The location was easy to find and it's a bright, modern, good-sized place, unlike their prior location. It was busy but coming from out of town, we'd made reservations. There's a good selection of imaginative dishes and everything we've tried over many trips has been excellent. The chicken fried bowl with cauliflower mash and kale was over the top delicious. I wouldn't dream of going through Omaha without stopping at Modern Love.
food is very good! great place to eat for vegans and non-vegan

Absolutely paradise ~ they actually knew the difference between gluten intolerant and celiac disease and cared for our table and our order accordingly.  NO REACTION, which is a miracle.  We traveled literally 500 miles from Chadron, Nebraska to enjoy a special night out, and have absolutely incredible memories (and delicious leftovers)!  Best decision we could have ever made, and we will be sure to make repeat visits.
Awesome food, awesome staff!! The things they do to plants is pure magic! Isa rocks Omaha’s socks off!!
Such a cute place! Great happy hour and fantastic food!
Best vegan spot in Omaha. Love love love this spot.

Amazing vegan food!  Only reason I gave 4 and not 5 stars was 1. my fries were cold when I got them and 2. the restaurant was a little more upscale than I anticipated.  Prices for some items were a little high but well worth it.  Because it was upscale, the decor seemed a bit sterile and not as fun as vegan restaurants in Chicago and Denver.  Highly recommend though, if you are vegan and in the area, definitely check it out.  Seitan wings were amazing.  Staff was friendly and cool.
(Editted) All Vegan restaurant with Gluten-Free options. New Midtown Crossing location is much larger than old locale. Good location for anyone, even non-Vegans.
Well I am not vegan. But I still really enjoyed this place.

Every time I go to modern love in impressed. This recent trip was for my mother's birthday. We are both going vegan so I decided to give her a real treat. She got the modern burger, a seitan and lentil burger with all the fixins as well as American style cashew cheese. Being new to veganism she found it odd but tasty. (She was an omnivore only a month ago.) We split a side of seitan buffalo wings. They have a delightful texture to sink your teeth into and the homemade ranch dipping sauce can satisfy any Midwesterner! I got the mac & shews. It comes with roasted cauliflower that was cooked well and still crunchy, the kale was soft and flavorful, the cornmeal crusted tofu reminds me a bit of fish sticks (which is awesome), and the mac itself was perfectly cooked and coated in a creamy savory increasingly cheesy tasting cashew cheese sauce. I also treated myself to a chickpea cutlet; a deliciously chewy addition to the mac. In definitely returning and will be bringing friends.
Food tastes great! Want to go back and try some different items!
Always excellent! This is my favorite place to eat when my family is in town. They are vegans and I am not. The food is so good I don't feel deprived in the least, I feel I've splurged!

Tasty options, HUGE portions and a great wine line-up.  Service was great, staff was friendly and genuine. We ordered a few apps and a few entrees:

Chilled beet soup: Delicious, 2nd best thing on the table! Huge bowl!

Seitan Buffalo Wings: Tasty, strong buffalo sauce flavor.

Cauliflower Wings (part of the special menu for restaurant week): Tasty

Chimichanga: OK, the sides were just OK as well.

Chick'n Fried Steak: OK, I thought it lacked a 'kick'. A bland take on a meaty standard.

Mac N' Shews: Star of the show! Delicious, tangy, filling. I'd get this and the beet soup again and again!
Loved the ambience and the vegan food options. Especially the dessert! 🤤
Garlic parmesan Brussels were the best!

We had an amazing evening at Modern Love! We started with Pomegranate Margaritas that were quite refreshing. For a starter we had parmesan-like coated Brussels Sprouts as well as their interpretation on buffalo wings featuring cauliflower. The main dish of risotto was quite creamy. We finished with a delightful Almond Joy inspired slice of pie.
Food ia always good.. chef quality... servers are always knowledgeable...

When you are a Lacto-ovo Vegetarian it's rare to find a Restaurant that caters to Vegetarians...I am uberly impressed and this is a definite favourite for me now...I even had my date try this restaurant unbeknownst to him it was Vegan and he is the Carnivore of all Carnivores and he tells his friends about his experience quite often...It is a delight and comfort to be able to eat in a Restaurant and not feel like being a Vegetarian there is a an unavoidable Neon sign attached to your forehead...Modern Love...you're my favourite Love...Thank you...
Always smilesfrom staff
So wonderful

The atmosphere was amazing. The restaurant has nice decor and good vibes. I tried the cauliflower wings and bbq onion ring burger. The cauliflower was delicious but the burger, in my opinion, was not worth the price.
There was something floating in my water but my server was quick to grab me a new cup so I really appreciated that. Unfortunately, as I was leaning back in my seat my friend pointed out to me a bug that was crawling on the seating. I felt a bit grossed out by that and swatted it away with my napkin.
With having a bug nearly crawl on me plus the dirty cup, I think it will be a while before I give this place another chance...
So amazing
Food is tasty
Wow, the food here is delicious! The all-vegan dishes have so many great flavors and the atmosphere is fun too. What a great find in a new-to-me city.
One of the great things about Omaha. Terrific vegan fare at decent prices.
Great!!!
Great Food and Customer Service,!

I really love the food out here. I am an Indian and have been raised on Vegetarian food all my life, so it was a real pleasure to get all this variety of vegan food in Modern love. It's a little expensive, but the food and drinks are creative and totally worth it.
Great place to bring your vegan friends. The menu is on the smaller side but the food is filling and tasty.
Very nice vegan restaurant. They have several nice option and also specials. The dessert I tried - death by chocolate Bundt cake was okay. Will certainly be back to try some options.
Excellent food. Great to grab take out for the airport.
This place is amazing.
Best vegan restaurant ever!
Great place to dine at, love the atmosphere!
Very nice atmosphere and by far the best vegan restsurant in town.
The chick pea burger was great!
Fantastic! You're going to want to try one of everything. It's all delicious!!
Didn't think I would like vegan food, but I have yet to come across something on their menu that wasn't good.

Service wasn't amazing on the night we went, but the food was all absolutely delicious and beautifully presented. Atmosphere is well-crafted and perfect for a special occasion, though a casual outing is great here too. We paid $50 for 2, including one drink and one dessert. Would definitely go again.
Always wonderful.   Great service and incredible food.  So delicious.

I am impressed.  Great flavor combinations. There was a kick to the barbecue tofu entree.  I appreciated the heat but it was too sharp for my wife.  You really really want to save room for dessert so split an entree.  My daughter had one of the" burgers". Amazing flavor from all vegan ingredients.  I recommend the peach cinnamon roll dessert.  The vegan ice cream was the ultimate topper on the peach cinnamon roll.

Staff was superb and knowable. We are from Chicago area on our way to Colorado vacation and we were very happy to find a place like this.
Jed423

I was pretty excited to come to this place. I should say, walking in, it seemed pretty swanky which was great. I would assume that a place like this would be focused on creating an experience for the person dining in. I eat out at restaurants frequently and I love coming to a place and feeling comfortable and feeling like I know I will be taken care of.  Unfortunately, this was not the case here. Our server was not the friendliest. We ordered a bottle of wine and she brought the wine out, and I should add, she nearly tore the cork in half (because she didn’t start the corkscrew in the center of the cork) and then just poured the wine. Usually you get to try a little, especially at a place like this. Nope! Just poured the wine and walked away. Turns out, she brought a different wine than what we ordered. We tried for the next 20 minutes to get her attention and she kept giving us the cold shoulder, avoiding eye contact. I worked in food service for over 25 years. If a customer is making eye contact, they need something. When our food came she came with another server and dropped one dish and bailed! I had to tell the other poor gal that she brought us the wrong wine. When she finally came back, it was super awkward. She owned up to her mistake but just asked if we liked the wine we had. We said It was OK, but we were being polite. It wasn’t that great. She just said ok and then bailed again. i hate feeling super awkward like that. The food was really good, but if you can’t train your servers to take care of folks, it’s not a place I’ll return to, no matter how good the food is.
1st time trying Vegan it was 👍 for die hard meat eater.
I always have to stop by when I'm in Omaha. It's the best.

We had the brussel sprout appetizer, nachos, and chana masala. Everything exceeded expectations, we were both very happy. I would definitely make this a habit if I lived here, but even as one place chosen for a weekend expedition trip, I would not have chosen differently in retrospect. It's hard to envision another place that would deliver as effectively on every level.
Lives amply up to its reputation as one of the finest vegan restaurants in the USA... Very reasonable prices for happy hour, given the amazing quality of the "comfort" food menu, and wine selection.

Food is excellent, prices are appropriate for specialty dining option, and wait time is not bad even on the busiest of nights. You can even call ahead if you want a WFPB menu option and they will accommodate accordingly!!!
The title may say vegan but don't let that intimidate anyone. The food is out of this world and you wouldn't know it was all plant based.
Amazing food!  I'll be back

Excellent!! I've been twice and both times have been wonderful experiences. My brother and his wife asked me "is that place really that good? Its vegan!" And YES it is. I am absolutely NOT a vegan. Not even in the neighborhood of vegetarian. This place is an absolute testament to how good vegan and gluten free foods can be. Yummy, great service, knowledgable wait staff, great cocktails and beer selection. Just great.

It's outstanding vegan fare. The service was excellent, the location was a very short walk from parking (free with validated ticket).
I had been wanting to go for a while, as the owner Isa Moskowitz has written a few of my favorite cookbooks. I was blown away.
The prices were also very reasonable.
We'll definitely be coming back.
Excellent Vegan Food and engaging wait staff 😄😁
Great comfort food drinks and dessert, you'll forget it's vegan and then remember and feel even better
Amazing food, fabulous atmosphere, friendly service - definitely five stars !

We live in Kansas City and spent a few days in Omaha on vacation. It would have been worth the drive to Omaha from KC just to eat here.
The kohlrabi poutine was a whimsical take on the classic dish from where I grew up, but so tasty that I’d choose this over the real deal any day. My wife loved the “Mac and Cheese”. The risotto was gorgeous and every element, while perfect individually, blended into a fabulous harmonious whole.
Best vegan meal I’ve ever had. Our sampling of the menu leaves us feeling like we could have ordered anything and left just as satisfied.
Simply Amazing!!!

Wow. Just wow. I received this location as a recommendation at a brewery the night before and my vegetarian friend made it a must for our Omaha trip. I’m so glad I agreed to go. THIS PLACE IS SO GOOD & PRETTY. Everything we tried was scrumptious and I didn’t care that it was all vegan because it was better than most actual meat plates I’ve had!  The dishes each came out with a stunning arrangement that complemented the fun pink booths they have. The true gem would be the desert I’d seen on their Instagram earlier that wasn’t on their actual printed menu. This pride special was not only wonderfully colorful but a true delight to eat. Each color brought a new flavor into the mix that all fit extremely well. The fact that lavender was in it at all made me know it was a mhsr. If you’re in Omaha at all, vegans and carnivores alike, you most definitely need to check this place out. Spectacular. 10/10.

Best vegan restaurant in the US. They do dinner and they do it amazingly well. They do seitan perfectly as well. It’s an amazing dining experience topped off with some of the neat desserts I’ve ever tasted. We tried the lemon cheesecake, phenomenal, and the Snickers pie, also phenomenal. Amazing on all fronts.
This restaurant is simply amazing. Everything we tasted was delicious and the deserts were unbelievable. The staff was also so friendly. A great experience!
Everything is bursting with flavor. The fried mozzarella was the highlight. It's probably good for our budget that we don't live in Omaha.
Damn, damn, damn good food! The fried mozzarella balls are incredible, as is the cauliflower. Mac and cheese is delish, my portobella salad was fantastic. Be warned, the portions are huge!
The food was alright, very pricey. But the milkshakes are to die for!!! Unfortunately I had terrible service on my first visit.

Delicious food, loving company, and a server who picked up on the special time my love and I were having. She asked what we were celebrating. I said happiness.

Our server wrote "To the celebration of happiness" on our bill. We tipped well.

Order appetizers, and a couple meals, and dessert to share with the table. All vegan food. I'm not vegan, so can't compare to other restaurants, but absolutely delicious! I've been a couple times and still talk about the Brussels sprouts in reverence.
The lemon blueberry cheese cake is the best.
An amazing dining experience. Thoroughly enjoyed the Roasted Risotto Mushroom Calamari. Highly recommended!
Vegan chicken fried steak, yes please.
Delicious.
Such a great feeling ordering from a restaurant where you can try anything from the menu. The food was tasty and reasonably priced. Very enjoyable for meatatarians and veggies alike.

Was in town for work and this is the only place in Omaha that's all plant based. I can say this place is awesome. The atmosphere is great and they definitely know what they're doing. You need to try out Modern Love if you love trying new cuisine.

My group ordered the following items: Watermelon Beats & Brie, Nachos, Fried Mozarella, Avacado Toast, Watermelon Agua Fresca, Cherry Soda, & Peach Kombucha.

Minus what I think was an overly strong taragon, the Watermelon Beats & Brie were awesome.
Nachos were great!  My kids fought over those.
Fried mozarella was really good too.  Another favorite with the kids.
Avacado Toast was so-so.
Cherry Soda was special...it tasted like a cherry pie.  You can actually taste the individual cherry, cinnamon, & vanilla flavors
Watermelon Agua Fresca was very refreshing and delicious.
Peach Kombucha was good as well.

Servers were very friendly and the restaurant has a great vibe.  I would recommend this establishment to anyone vegan or not.

I got a chocolate malt milkshake and my finacée got the blueberry spiked lemonade. Both of the drinks were great and tasted awesome. For entrees, we split the chimichanga and pasta with chickpea parmesan. The parmesan was crispy and flavorful. They really know how to get it crispy. The only thing I didn't like about this meal was the salad. The sauce was not my favorite.
This place was awesome. Vegan cheese is still a new concept to me, but everything was great.
You can't get better vegan food anywhere else!
We will be back! Holy moly, so great!
Some of the best food I've had in a long time. Absolutely loved it. Also had good service.
Yummiest place I've ever been!

OMG!!! Everyone needs to try their food.  I have food allergies and cannot have dairy, eggs or beef.  This is recent for me and it has been so hard to give up delicious food.  I would not know that this food is vegan.  It is unbelievable!  I ordered 4 items to try the variety and they were all amazing.  I am ordering it again tomorrow.  I ordered my food through Door Dash and was so impressed with how the food arrived.  It looks as good as the pictures.

I had to try each dish my group choose and each one was delicious!  The masala dish was my favorite.  Very creative take on food.  I wish there was a couple dishes that were more recognizable for a guest that would want something simple other than the mushroom burger.

Outstanding real non soy vegan  food that's tasty, delicious and good for your health.
Clean environment. The artistry of the wings on the wall is worth the visit we take a photo everytime we go. We have to thank our nephew James, for taking us and now my husband and I make sure to visit whenever we're in Omaha.

Awesome vegan restaurant with a wide range of dishes and a quirky selection of cocktails. The oyster mushroom calamari is ridiculously on point and the serving size is huge. Definitely order the Watermelon, Beets and Brie - the flavor combination is amazing!

I cannot overstate how delicious this place was - and I'm not even a vegan! The brussel sprouts appetizer will live in my dreams and the chickpea burger was insanely satisfying. Meat-eaters: don't be scared, this place will take care of you!
Love love LOVE this place! The nachos are awesome! Actually,  everything was AWESOME! New fave!

The restaurant is designed beautifully. The cocktail list is creative and delicious. We don’t live in Omaha. We Googled fine dining restaurants and a million steakhouses came up. We asked the front desk at our hotel for a vegetable forward restaurant. We didn’t realize Modern Love was a vegan restaurant. It was one of the most delicious meals I have had in a restaurant in a long time. Even if you aren’t a vegan or vegetarian I highly recommend this restaurant!
Had the mac & shews, so delicious, loved it.  Nice atmosphere and helpful staff.  I would recommend reservations.
This place is super cute and every single item we tried (almost the whole menu) was ridiculously good and beautiful!
Weird place
Fantastic! If you didn't know it was vegan/gluten free, you can't tell! Will recommend to everyone!

It's 100% vegan, but it's a good place for anyone.  The food was good enough to please a meat eater like me.  The fried mushrooms were unlike anything I'd ever had.  Make sure you get a shake - they're addictive.

My best friend is vegan and from out of town, so I figured we would try this place after the zoo. Everything we had was amazing! I got the mac, she got lasagna, and our boys got the bbq bowl and the masala. We also got the buff wings. LOVED all of it. We will def go back if we are in the area!

Delicious food! I am a big fan of Isa's cookbooks, for the recipes and her wit, so I am absolutely delighted that she has a restaurant here in Omaha. The Midtown Crossing location is convenient and spacious, with plenty of parking options. The servers are always fun and informative - and if you're lucky, Isa herself, may serve you! Modern Love debunks all the silly vegan stereotypes and myths...and proves that veganism is vibrant, romantic, comforting, and mouth-watering delicious (all at the same time)!

First time eating at an all-vegan restaurant and I must say, I was pleasantly surprised. The atmosphere was very modern yet still very cozy. We were greeted right away when we arrived and sat down in a cozy booth a couple of minutes later! While looking through the rather extensive menu, we settled on some drinks, including an interesting Kombucha and a very drinkable glass of Riesling.  The Avocado Garlic Bread was good, although the bread had become a little soggy underneath the avocado, arugula and a little bit heavy handed on the truffle oil. We also tasted the Summer Squash Chana Masala and Mushroom Bourguignon. Both dishes were also pleasant although the Mushroom was the favorite dish of the night. Service was excellent and friendly even though we were one of the last tables of the evening. We didn’t have time to look at the dessert menu but regardless we were way to full anyway. I’ll have to save it for next time I’m in Omaha!

My first visit was for mother's day brunch. The portobello steak salad I had was excellent and our server was charming and attentive. We were seated by the owner in a comfy booth right in the center of a really nicely appointed dining area. Great meal and a great gift.
Food is great! The vibe is high.

Just WOW. Drove from Des Moines to have dinner here for my friend's birthday. The staff was so friendly and checked on us often. We ordered Cauliflower Peanut Wings and Mozzarella Balls(MUST GET!) for our appetizers! I had the Masala w/ tofu which was AMAZING and my friend had the special. We both enjoyed the Snickers pie after. Our glasses were topped off the entire time. Arlo was our server, super nice and friendly!! I will drive the two hours one way to have dinner here again!

Five BIG stars for Modern Love from two fat and happy vegans! :) We were visiting family in Omaha one weekend and one of them wanted to take us here because it was all vegan. We didn't know what to expect, but upon looking at the menu, I was floored by how many things they offered vegan. Fried mozzarella, nahos, seitan buffalo wings, poutine (OMG), lasagna, mac n cheese, seitan shawarma, and the list keeps going. Eventually we settled on the fried mozz and nachos for apps, lasagna, mushroom swizz burger, and shawarma for dinner, and a blackberry cheesecake and snickers pie for dessert. Needless to say, we had to be rolled out of the restaurant afterwards but it was so worth it. This place is a little pricier than most, but considering what they're offering, you won't mind paying for it. I can't wait to go back the next time we visit!
Good is amazing, service is typically lacking
Fresh foods with tradition entree selections and delicious crisp salads with favorful dressings.

Modern Love is the best vegan restaurant I've been too...from the employees to the set-up ML❤️
Try a shake or some vegan macaroni n cheese #Yummy
Amazing food and service.
Great cocktails, kombucha, and food for all eaters. I am an omnivore and am always super satisfied by the vegan comfort food at Modern Love
Great food - even if you aren't a vegan.
